title: Cane River Creole National Historical Park: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit          Good planning is the key for an enjoyable visit. For group tours (10 or more) please read these  guidelines:   1. Groups of 10 or more are required to make a reservation at least two weeks prior to the visit. Reservations must be made through park interpretive staff Barbara Justice or Tim Van Cleave only by calling 318-356-8441.    2. Only 15 visitors are allowed in the main house at Oakland Plantation on any given guided tour.  Tour length is 45 minutes. Please plan accordingly.    3. Groups that do not make a reservation may not be able to be fully accommodated.
